page.title: 02Religion Parish Church.
page.content: Otford has a new Vicar. He has been at Otford for five months and he e thinks that the "natives are friendly" but he feels like a new boy on his first day at school. He has had six previous churches, some in towns and others in villages. He feels the Otford people are very polite and he feels very welcome. He is responsible for 4000 parishioners here. A Vicar is constantly having to change his mood according to people's problems. He would like a little more informality in church worship here but there must be a different service to suit different people. For example older people like a more traditional service whilst young children need more informality. We were shown the altar, pulpit, lectern and the vestry.
